CustomField.formula: CASE(Cadence_Type__c, 'Inbound-Forms', 'Sales-All Inbound', 'SMB INB', 'Sales-All Inbound', 'Inbound-Oasis', 'Sales-All Inbound', TEXT(Cadence_Type__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If multiple cadence types should be evaluated together (to make sure only one is active at a time), this is the group this cadence type is part of.
CustomField.label: Cadence Type Group
